parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the parent control of a given child control. If the control is not part of a [[CT_CONTROLS_GROUP]] control then [[controlNull]] is returned. To return parent [[Display]] of the control use [[ctrlParent]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ctrlParentControlsGroup]] ctrl

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> ctrl: [[Control]] - child control

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ctrlCombo = _ctrl [[controlsGroupCtrl]] 100; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>control</value></part></template>
[[ctrlParentControlsGroup]] _ctrlCombo; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>parent control group (_ctrl)</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[controlsGroupCtrl]], [[ctrlParent]], [[displayParent]], [[allControls]], [[allDisplays]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]</root>
